entry: Enter when 9 EMA crosses VWAP (9 EMA upsloping crossing flat/down VWAP -> long). Enter immediately.
stop: Measured move stop based on pivot or 0.02 below support.
trailing: Move stop to breakeven after partial; trail to VWAP/EMA.
notes: Implement VWAP + 9EMA gate; images contain annotated thresholds.
